name: Channel Surfing (MachiTeaStudios)
description:
Welcome to Channel Surfing! 

This game was made for the Game Off 2022!

The goal of the game is to complete one of the three mini games on each difficulty!

The team enjoyed creating this one and we hope that you enjoy playing it!

Credits:

Malik - Developer

Jayland - SFX / Game Designer 

Ethan - SFX / Music / Game Designer / Developer

Mikalo - UI Designer / Developer 

Tyler - Art
